item.title: Python Pandas API Oddities
item.description: This post uses the Delta Airlines Airports Wikipedia HTML table as an example to highlight some niche functions in Python's pandas library. It's aimed at the more advanced stuff on the fringes of the docs. Here are some oddities of the less traveled parts of the pandas documentation. You never â€¦
